name: Candy Sweet: Adventures in Candyland
description:
Candy Sweet is a brand new jellies and candies saga destined to all kids and young people out there. A new match 3 game dedicated to everyone, every kid, girl, boy, teenager out there who love the sweets and the bon bons. Crush the competition in a unique candy game saga! Start to candy frenzy and cookie blast all of them and gain huge experience and gems and bonuses. Crush the candies and blast waves of light to gain extra bonuses and combos. Collect all the cookie star in the game and manage your time correctly because you have different game goals like time mode, move mode. You will have to candy crash all of these little juicy and tasty sweets! Get more than 2 stars to unlock new levels and bonuses! This is one of the best games candy blast saga! This is a easy game to play, but very hard to master!

Enjoy colorful levels and prepare to be amazed of the amazing journey in candyland. This arcade puzzle game lets you move from easy levels to more complex levels, so the gameplay is always getting better and better and you will collect more experience and lots of surprizes! The main objective of the game is to match the little sweets 3 in a row or more either by horrizontal or vertical. If you get 5 in a row, you will get a special color bomb which is very powerful in destroying the sweets and getting tons of bonuses!

With Candy Sweet you will have to smash each and every little candy out there and get bonuses for matching more than 3 candies or cookies!

Features:
• Tasty and sweet candies, your little kids will love playing with the jellies and will blow their minds with awesome game effects!
• Over 100+ breath taking levels
• Lots of game goals, move mode, time mode, collect ingredients mode, etc.
• Surreal graphics, you will want to eat the candies, cookies and the jellies in this game!
• Do your best, get the highest score!
• Match colors in your free time and relax playing a super puzzle game!

Download Candy Sweet now and start your amazing bonbon saga experience!
